snippet.title: Big Action Mega Fight! PREMIUM - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Big Action Mega Fight! is an action-packed beat 'em up brawler. Ultra arcade fighting meets high-score frenzy!  Now available on:

iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/app/id672277660?mt=8
Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dblstallion.bamf
Amazon Appstore - http://www.amazon.com/Execution-Labs-Action-Mega-Fight/dp/B00J7XDLPM (with Amazon Fire TV support)
Ouya - https://www.ouya.tv/game/Big-Action-Mega-Fight/

Take on the role of Brick Strongarm, defeat the vicious criminal Clunks gang and lay down the law in the city of Megatropolis. Beat up crime. Save the City!

Features:
- Premium version: game completely rebalanced, now with no ads or in-app purchases
- Over 35 stages of non-stop fighting action
- On mobile: intuitive touch-based controls will make you forget you ever needed a controller to play fighting games
- On microconsoles: game controller support and high-definition graphics optimized for television display
- Customizable character, special move and power-up upgrade systems
- Hand-drawn animated characters and beautifully detailed environments
- Gripping dramatic storyline
- Soundtrack that'll make you hop & bop like it's 1989

----

Get the soundtrack!
https://vibeavenue.bandcamp.com/album/big-action-mega-fight-ost

Get some swag!
http://www.swagling.com/product-category/bamf/

----

Keep in touch and follow us online!

http://www.bigactionmegafight.com
http://www.doublestalliongames.com

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DoubleStallion
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/dblstallion
Tumblr: http://www.doublestallion.tumblr.com
Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/DoubleStallion/
